    • Method Detail

      • size

        public void size(int width,
        int height)
        Sets the width and height of the internal area of the window. The actual window will be slightly wider and higher to account for the frame and title bar. Parameter values must be between 50 and 2000, inclusive. If values are invalid or window.size is not called, the window's width and height are 100. This method should only be called once, in setup(). Applets: method is ignored.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the internal area of the window
        height - the height of the internal area of the window

      • title

        public void title(java.lang.String _title)
        Set the title of the window.
        Parameters:
        _title - the title of the window

        Method will set the FPS of the window.
        Parameters:
        _f - the FPS value
